text: Dr.Vijay Kumar Sohanlal M.B.B.S, M.S ORTHOPAEDICSF.S.S.A (Australia), F.A.R.S (Germany), F.A.A (Mumbai)Arihant Vaikunt Apartment,Block 1, Flat 3A, 123 - 125A Bricklin Road, Purasawalkam,Chennai - 600007Phone no #    +91 98401 93315 E-mail-   vijay.saklecha@gmail.com  website :-  hipnkneereplacements.comEducation:•Sri Ramachandra University, Sri Ramachandra Medical College & Research Institute,(S.R.M.C.&R.I)  Chennai,Tamilnadu,India.
